Returns: a Cursor representing the results of the new query
Parameters: CharSequence: the constraint with which the query must be filtered
runQuery(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Runs a query with the specified constraint. This query is requested by the filter attached to this adapter. Contract: when constraint is null or empty, the original results, prior to any filtering, must be returned.

ClassDesc: This class can be used by external clients of CursorAdapter and CursorTreeAdapter to define how the content of the adapter should be filtered.
